channel.title: Docker on Omri Bornstein
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Omri Bornstein

item.title: Testing HTTPS Locally with Caddy
item.description: Whether you’re testing HTTPS for a bunch of endpoints locally through a localhost port, or whether you just like to name things, to me it sounds like you need to use a reverse proxy.

item.title: Continuous Integration with GoReleaser
item.description: This document summarises how I set-up GoReleaser Continuous Integration/Deployment (CI/CD) for my Go (Programming Language) projects, such that I have a portable configuration for compilation, packaging and releasing settings.

item.title: raker
item.description: A social media scraper that is interfaced via a server-side rendered HTML user interface (or a CLI), and is managed by a REST API and a NoSQL database.

item.title: scr-web
item.description: My previous attempt at building a full-stack social media scraper, which is built with Angular on the front-end, and Nest on the back-end.
